creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
inscription:
Signature, Date, Inscription, Stamp

inscribed in plate at top: [HERCVLES CERBERVM TRICIPITEM AD SVPEROS PERTRAXIT]
markings: blue stamp on verso, lower left: Ducs d\'Arenberg (Lugt 567)
provenance: Ducs d'Arenberg; David Tunick, New York; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: monogram and date in plate at bottom center: [1545 HSB]
title: Hercules Capturing Cerberus, From the Labors of Hercules
